items.description: Fixed an issue where the advanced arrest report preview would not render fonts correctly.
Corrected validation logic on the basic arrest report to only trigger on submission.
Aligned the GitHub icon in the sidebar for better visual consistency.
Introduced the Announcements system to keep users updated with the latest news.
Implemented the Advanced Arrest Report with modifier presets for automated text generation.
Overhauled the Settings page for managing default and alternative characters.
Resolved multiple data persistence issues across application stores.
